ModMetaData.name: Titular Royalty
ModMetaData.author: Canon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds titles to the player faction you can grant to your pawns with the Staff of Royalty or at Any Throne
(VERSION 1.1) - Custom Titlelists (VERSION 1.2) - Custom Titles Support (VERSION 1.2.1) - Extra Debug Logging (VERSION 1.2.2) - Patched the Antinium Mod (VERSION 1.3) - Added Support for 1.4 and alternate Roman Titles (VERSION 1.4) - Added the Title Manager GUI available on any Vanilla Throne to rename your titles and containing an alternative way to grant them \n- Also allows you to change realm types and custom titles without reloading your colony by pressing the update button in the title manager. (VERSION 1.4.1) - Vanilla Expanded Framework is no longer Required. (VERSION 1.4.2) - Fixed not being able to attack with melee weapons\n- Better Consort display for the grant titles with staff GUI (VERSION 1.4.3) - Fixed bug where you would get quests from your own pawns or faction. (VERSION 1.5) - Added two more mod settings, a checkbox to enable or disable the apparel quality requirements and a checkbox reenabling vanilla title inheritance, you can also set a pawns title heir at the throne now.
